description: Upper-right triangle resulting from binomial transform calculation for nonnegative integers.
links: F. Ellermann, Illustration of binomial transforms
C.-A. Laisant, Sur les tableaux de sommes - Nouvelles applications, Compt. Rendus de l'Association Francaise pour l'Avancement des Sciences, Aout. 04, 1893, pp. 206-216 (table given on p. 212).
formula: a(n, n) = n; a(n, k)=a(n, k-1)+a(n+1, k) if k>n. a(n, k)=(k+n)*2^(k-n-1) if k >= n.T(2n,n) = 3*n*2^(n-1) = 3*A001787(n). [_Philippe Deléham_, Apr 21 2009]
crossrefs: Rows include (essentially) A001787, A001792, A045623, A045891, A034007. Diagonals include (essentially) A001477, A005408, A008586, A017113, A017113, A008598. Column sums are A058877.
author: _Henry Bottomley_, May 30 2001
